This is standard deviation, 10 quantile, and 90 quantile for salinity and temperature all in one dataframe. It includes the 8 environments-of-origin and the 2 environments-of-experiment. 

```{r}

envr_quants_raw <- read_csv(file.path("..", "..", "data", "pairwise_differences_analyses", "H2F_envr_20250409.csv"))

```

### Data preparation

```{r}

# change _ to - in site names
envr_quants_raw$site_name <- gsub("_", "-", envr_quants_raw$site_name)

envr_quants_filtered <- envr_quants_raw %>% 
  filter(!site_name %in% c("LEW", "YRK")) %>% # remove environments of experiment
  arrange(factor(site_name, levels = c("W1-TX", "W2-LA", "W3-FL", "S1-LOLA", "S2-DEBY", "W4-VA", "W5-NH", "W6-ME"))) # reorder

# save as csv
write.csv(envr_quants_filtered, "../../data/envr_of_origin/envr_quantiles_summary.csv")
          
# remove site names from data frame and save as object
envr_quants_dist <- subset(envr_quants_filtered, select = -c(site_name))
```

### Run distance analysis 

```{r}
# run distance analysis and save to matrix
envr_quants_mat <- as.matrix(dist(envr_quants_dist))
rownames(envr_quants_mat) <- c("W1-TX", "W2-LA", "W3-FL", "S1-LOLA", "S2-DEBY", "W4-VA", "W5-NH", "W6-ME")
colnames(envr_quants_mat) <- c("W1-TX", "W2-LA", "W3-FL", "S1-LOLA", "S2-DEBY", "W4-VA", "W5-NH", "W6-ME")

# save envr distance matrix as csv
saveRDS(envr_quants_mat, "../../data/envr_of_origin/envr_quantiles_dist.rds")

View(envr_quants_mat)
```
